nodes.title: Sekhang Tekchen Mindröl Gyatso Ling Introduction

nodes.body: gSas khang Theg chen smin grol rgya mtsho gling
nodes.title: 1. Name

nodes.body: gDong mgo village of sPyi tshang (latitude: 35°32’17”N, longitude: 102°04’00”E).
nodes.title: 2. Location

nodes.body: There are twenty two Bonpo tantric practitioners in the temple.
nodes.title: 5. Number of practitioners

nodes.body: Kun bzang and ’Bum pa from the 21st to the 26thday of the 1st month. Kun bzang on the 10th day of each month. Kun bzang and ’Bum pa for five days at a suitable time in the 5th month. sTag la from the 16th to the 21st day of the 11th month.
nodes.title: 8 / 9. Rituals

nodes.body: gDong mgo village comprising forty-four families (three hundred and ten people altogether) is considered as the lha sde of the temple.
nodes.title: 12. Local community

nodes.body: The two la btsas of mThar smug and Tshe lung are propitiated on the same day by the people of gDong mgo, rGyal mtsho dpal and Gad pa skya bo villages.
nodes.title: 13. Local festivals
14. Economic occupation of the local people
